# [Interview #467: Macmillan Interview at Book Expo America, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=467#2)

#### Interviewer

Hi, Brandon.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Hi.

#### Interviewer

And we're here at Book Expo America. And I wanted to ask you a few questions about your upcoming book,
*The Gathering Storm*
.

#### Brandon

Yes, of course.
